baze_de_date:
- Conceptual model deals only with bussines needs( functional and informational )
- Nontransferabilitate ( se noteaza cu un diamant pe ERD ) A SHIFT cannot be changed to another BOOTH( or to another VOLUNTEER )
- Nontransferabilitate conditionala Shift assigments can sometimes be changed if the shift has not started yet. However these cannot be represented in the diagram, but must still be documented.
